pkgmetadata.longdescription: Using Block Model to Estimate the Robustness of Ecological Network // Implementation of a variety of methods to compute the robustness of ecological interaction networks with binary interactions as described in doi:10.1002/env.2709. In particular, using the Stochastic Block Model and its bipartite counterpart, the Latent Block Model to put a parametric model on the network, allows the comparison of the robustness of networks differing in species richness and number of interactions. It also deals with networks that are partially sampled and/or with missing values.
